chargeHist.descr: Failure to Disclose Event Affecting Eligibility (>$10000)

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Jury trial - 12 person on January 26, 2023 at 08:00 am.

10:57 AM Defendant Christopher C Camen in court.  Attorney Dan Firkus in court for Christopher C Camen.  Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court Reporter appears by zoom.

11:01 AM Court relates and gives appearances.
11:01  Atty. Firkus relates. Defense acknowledges receipt of information and waives further reading of same.  NG pleas entered.
Jury trial set for January 26 & 27, 2023.
Proposed Jury Instructions, Witness Lists, Verdict Forms, any Motions and Notice of Intent to Use Video are to be filed no later than 1/19/2022.
Bond to continue.

03:00 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Dan Firkus in court for Christopher C Camen. Defendant Christopher C Camen appeared by video. 3:03 PM Gloria Frelk, Eau Claire County DHHS, called, sworn, and direct by state and appears by Zoom.  3:11 Cross by defense. 3:13 Chief Heather Wolfe, Cumberland Police Department, called, sworn, and direct by state. 3:17  Witness identifies DE. Court finds probable cause and binds DE over. Bond continues. Parties to appear in person to next hearing. Notice to be sent to DE in the mail.
Arraignment scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Attorney fees.  Dan Firkus appointed.  Repay $50.00 per month starting 07/01/2022.
Preliminary hearing on June 13, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

10:01 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Christopher C Camen appeared by video.  Attorney Dan Firkus appeared by video for Christopher C Camen. 
Set for preliminary hearing. May appear by zoom for the preliminary hearing. Defendant to use the same zoom information. Notice to be sent by JA.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 13, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

Needs to contact the SPD office to qualify for SPD representation. 10:38 Case recalled with the same appearances. Defendant does not qualify for SPD representation.
